content.astrolich.victrixLudorum.hide.de: You have learned the best way to attack your enemies is when they are looking the other way. You coneal yourself at a DR10.
content.astrolich.victrixLudorum.maim.de: You have an unconventional method of combat. When you land a critical hit, you force your enemy to roll on the broken table.
content.astrolich.victrixLudorum.stabbed: Attack using your agility at DR +2. A succesful blow renders the target incapable of moving.
content.astrolich.victrixLudorum.dirtySp: Successful attacks with a spear infect.
